parameters.functionCode: const positions = items[0]?.json ? [items[0].json] : []; const signals = items[1]?.json ? [items[1].json] : []; const prices = items[2]?.json ? [items[2].json] : []; const portfolio = items[3]?.json || {total_portfolio_value: 100000}; const priceMap = {}; prices.forEach(p => {priceMap[p.symbol] = parseFloat(p.close)}); const positionMap = {}; positions.forEach(p => {positionMap[p.symbol] = p}); const trades = []; const timestamp = new Date().toISOString(); const capital = portfolio.total_portfolio_value * 0.01; signals.forEach(sig => {const symbol = sig.symbol; const currentPrice = priceMap[symbol]; if (!currentPrice) return; const existingPos = positionMap[symbol]; const position_size = capital / currentPrice * sig.signal_strength; if (sig.signal === 1 && !existingPos) {trades.push({symbol, side: 'BUY', quantity: Math.floor(position_size), price: currentPrice, strategy_type: sig.strategy_type, timestamp})} else if (sig.signal === -1 && !existingPos) {trades.push({symbol, side: 'SELL', quantity: Math.floor(position_size), price: currentPrice, strategy_type: sig.strategy_type, timestamp})} else if (sig.signal === 0 && existingPos) {trades.push({symbol, side: existingPos.quantity > 0 ? 'SELL' : 'BUY', quantity: Math.abs(existingPos.quantity), price: currentPrice, strategy_type: existingPos.strategy_type, timestamp})}}); return trades.map(t => ({json: t}));

const positionUpdates = []; const tradeLog = []; items.forEach(item => {const t = item.json; tradeLog.push({symbol: t.symbol, side: t.side, quantity: t.quantity, price: t.price, pnl: 0, strategy_type: t.strategy_type, timestamp: t.timestamp}); if (t.side === 'BUY') {positionUpdates.push({symbol: t.symbol, quantity: t.quantity, entry_price: t.price, current_price: t.price, unrealized_pnl: 0, position_value: t.quantity * t.price, strategy_type: t.strategy_type, entry_date: new Date().toISOString()})} else if (t.side === 'SELL') {positionUpdates.push({symbol: t.symbol + '_CLOSED', quantity: 0, entry_price: t.price, current_price: t.price, unrealized_pnl: 0, position_value: 0, strategy_type: t.strategy_type, entry_date: new Date().toISOString()})}}); return [];
